content:
Hi,

We created few customized value sets most of them from SNOMED CT.
FHIR provided value sets have OID ex: http://build.fhir.org/valueset-marital-status.html contains OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.3.29.

How can we define OID's for customized value sets defined by own.

From https://www.hl7.org/fhir/terminologies-systems.html
http://snomed.info/sct URI as OID 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96.

Most of our valuesets created from SNOMED CT . So can we add some uniques number for this OID for our valuesets?

Or any other way so we can provide OID for valuesets which are customized.

Thanks in Advance.
